fruits.name: Apple
fruits.description: Apples are crisp and delicious, known for their high fiber content and antioxidant properties.

fruits.name: Banana
fruits.description: Bananas are rich in potassium and provide a great source of quick energy. They are commonly used in smoothies and desserts.

fruits.name: Orange
fruits.description: Oranges are a great source of vitamin C, known for boosting the immune system and providing refreshing flavor.

fruits.name: Strawberry
fruits.description: Strawberries are sweet and juicy, full of antioxidants and perfect for adding to desserts or smoothies.

fruits.name: Grapes
fruits.description: Grapes are small, sweet, and come in various colors. They are rich in vitamins C and K, making them a healthy snack.

fruits.name: Pineapple
fruits.description: Pineapples are tropical fruits known for their spiky exterior and sweet, tangy flavor. They are excellent for digestion.

fruits.name: Watermelon
fruits.description: Watermelons are large and hydrating, perfect for summer snacks. They are rich in vitamins A, B6, and C.

fruits.name: Mango
fruits.description: Mangoes are tropical fruits known for their juicy, sweet, and vibrant flavor. They are high in vitamin C and A.

fruits.name: Kiwi
fruits.description: Kiwis are small fruits with a unique tangy taste. They are loaded with vitamin C and fiber, often used in salads.

fruits.name: Blueberry
fruits.description: Blueberries are small, sweet, and packed with antioxidants. They are great for improving memory and reducing inflammation.
